thread.title: Trip of the week | Slovenia: Julian Alps to the Adriatic
thread.title_full: Trip of the week | Slovenia: Julian Alps to the Adriatic | The Columbus Dispatch

author: Dispatch
title: Trip of the week | Slovenia: Julian Alps to the Adriatic
text:
Each week, Travel Editor Cindy Decker highlights an interesting travel package sent to her inbox.
Slovenia: Julian Alps to the Adriatic 
COUNTRY WALKERS GUIDED
WALKING, 1-800-234-6900, www.countrywalkers.com  
THE TRIP: This guided walking tour explores Slovenia in central Europe.
Guests will hike the sun-drenched coast of the Adriatic Sea, the Venetian-Gothic alleyways of seaside Piran and the shore of Lake Bohinj.
Guests will also explore terraced vineyards near the hilltop town of Medana and the limestone outcrops and hillside farms of the Soca Valley.
The trip includes two expert local guides, all meals except one lunch and dinner, transportation from the departure point to the meeting point and all accommodations.
THE COST: from $4,198 a person, double occupancy

@DispatchTravel
